headline: Venezuela’s Maduro Captured by U.S. and Flown Out of Country, Trump Says
summary: The U.S. has captured Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro and carried out a “large scale strike” against the country, President Donald Trump said in a social-media post Saturday.  Maduro and his wife have been “flown out of the Country,” Trump said.  The attack follows months of building tension between the U.S. and Venezuela.

content.title: Venezuela’s Maduro Captured by U.S. and Flown Out of Country, Trump Says
content.summary: The U.S. has captured Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro and carried out a “large scale strike” against the country, President Donald Trump said in a social-media post Saturday.  Maduro and his wife have been “flown out of the Country,” Trump said.  The attack follows months of building tension between the U.S. and Venezuela.

headline: Maduro Captured, Indicted After US Airstrikes on Venezuela
summary: President Nicolás Maduro has been charged in the US after he was captured and flown out of Venezuela, following a series of airstrikes that mark an extraordinary escalation in the Trump administration’s months-long campaign against the country.  “The United States of America has successfully carried out a large scale strike against Venezuela and its leader, President Nicolas Maduro, who has been, along with his wife, captured and flown out of the Country,” President Donald Trump wrote on social media Saturday.  US Attorney General Pam Bondi said on X Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, have been indicted, with the Venezuelan leader facing charges of “Narco-Terrorism Conspiracy, Cocaine Importation Conspiracy, Possession of Machineguns and Destructive Devices, and Conspiracy to Possess Machineguns and Destructive Devices against the United States.”

content.title: Maduro Captured, Indicted After US Airstrikes on Venezuela
content.summary: President Nicolás Maduro has been charged in the US after he was captured and flown out of Venezuela, following a series of airstrikes that mark an extraordinary escalation in the Trump administration’s months-long campaign against the country.  “The United States of America has successfully carried out a large scale strike against Venezuela and its leader, President Nicolas Maduro, who has been, along with his wife, captured and flown out of the Country,” President Donald Trump wrote on social media Saturday.  US Attorney General Pam Bondi said on X Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, have been indicted, with the Venezuelan leader facing charges of “Narco-Terrorism Conspiracy, Cocaine Importation Conspiracy, Possession of Machineguns and Destructive Devices, and Conspiracy to Possess Machineguns and Destructive Devices against the United States.”
